wellerman.name: Wellerman
wellerman.description: A pirate classic, nothing makes you feel the ocean breeze in your hair like a whaling shanty

jolirouge.name: Joli Rouge
jolirouge.description: Something a bit more upbeat, slam your flagon's and chug 'til ye drop.

hoisthecolours.name: Hoist the Colours
hoisthecolours.description: Reaffirm your loyalty to the pirate way and feel this deep, bellowing rendition inspire you to take up arms.

leaveherjohnny.name: Leave Her Johnny
leaveherjohnny.artist: Michiel Schrey, Nils Brown, Sean Dagher
leaveherjohnny.description: A mellow shanty that will stick in your head for days on end

spanishlades.name: Spanish Ladies
spanishlades.description: A naval classic, join the chorus and below your love for the Spanish Ladies

hesapirate.name: He's a Pirate
hesapirate.description: The iconic PotC song, speakers to the max and try to discover why the rum is gone

potc.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
potc.description: A Pirates of the Caribbean medley performed by the incredibly unique Cello players 2CELLOS. They've got to be the best Cellists I've ever seen...
